places.name: Strasbourg
places.description: Strasbourg is the capital city of the Grand Est region in northeastern France. It's known for its stunning medieval architecture, picturesque canals, and its beautiful cathedral, Strasbourg Cathedral.

places.name: Paris
places.description: Paris, the capital city of France, is famous for its iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Notre-Dame Cathedral. It's also renowned for its world-class cuisine and art museums.

places.name: Milan
places.description: Milan is a global fashion and design capital in northern Italy. It's home to historic art and cultural institutions like the Milan Cathedral, Leonardo da Vinci's 'The Last Supper' painting, and many more.
